== Main Inclusion Report for libunix-syslog-perl ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libu/libunix-syslog-perl/
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed to promote amavisd-new which is one of the target packages for ubuntu-server review spec.
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review: None
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Just a perl library, no end user program.
** No Debian bugs.
** Upstream bug tracker http://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=Unix-Syslog - No significant bugs
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system (dpatch).
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
